body_html: thanks for the direction, may you clarify a little bit more on changing system settings? I am not very sure where should I be looking at. Also, is compiler_arch_native_support failed an issue? I noticed after the upgrade from tf 1.3 to 1.4, my gpu utility (2 1080 ti) drop from 90% to 30 %, efficiency decreased as well by more than 3 quarters. This is why I try to build from source ( I previously use pip install tensorflow_gpu --upgrade). I notice my pc support AVX2 but I am not sure how to compile arch:AVX/AVX2 together, but nevertheless, the new build does not yield any performance gain. CPU remains excessively high in usage (abnormally) and gpu outrageously low utility. I am pretty desperate now, would be great to have your advice.
